mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_REGISTER_DATE, COMMUNITY_UPDATE_DATE, U.ID, USER_NAME FROM TBL_COMMUNITY C JOIN TBL_USER U ON U.ID = C.USER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT I.ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_WRITER_NAME, INQUIRY_WRITER_EMAIL, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, A.ID FROM TBL_INQUIRY I JOIN TBL_ANSWER A ON I.ID = A.INQUIRY_ID
SELECT ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_WRITER_NAME, INQUIRY_WRITER_EMAIL, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_CONTENT FROM TBL_INQUIRY WHERE ID = #{inquiryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANSWER (ID, ANSWER_TITLE, ANSWER_CONTENT, USER_ID, INQUIRY_ID) VALUES (SEQ_ANSWER.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryTitle}, #{answerContent}, #{userId}, #{inquiryId})
